Name: 梦魇：无归 Nightmare without return
About the game: [background] This is a journey without return When you wake up... In the strange space, the bronze gate that eats people, the strange rules of the game, and the ever-changing nightmare world appear in front of you; You will shuttle among them and become a participant in every story. Life and death, love and hate, and each other's fetters seem to have been engraved in the fate; When you go through the waves, go through one world after another, and open the door to freedom, you will find that all this is just a corner of reincarnation Everything is going on [game features] 0. Sign a contract, life and death are determined by fate 1. Infinite flow (shuttle through multiple worlds) 2. Multi career choice 3. My wife is very beautiful, and my cat is very cute 4. The equipment system is featured and elaborately made 5. The monster challenge is very unique. One of the powerful monsters will kill you 6. There should be a lot more, but I forgot (meow is the first in the world)
